07.title: Avalon Adjustment
07.description: <q>Avalon Adjustment</q> is a web application prowered by ReactJS/Redux. Application integrates several internal accounting devisions and helps them to collaborate and communicate on a single platform. Accountant will be able to raise their month end or year end journals for approval process. Application features available to system users based on the users role. Jest/Enzyme is used for TDD and unit testing. Selenium webDrivers enables e2e testing. SonarCube is used to identify/detect code smells, redundancies and duplication etc. Coding patter enforced by linters. Jenkins used for CI/CD. Jira is used as ticketing system in the agile environment. Git is the source control system.

subProjects.title: Journal Raiser
subProjects.description: Allows accountant to raise month end and year end journals for approvals

subProjects.title: Journal Approvals
subProjects.description: Allows approver to validate the approve journals for further accounting

subProjects.title: User Adminstration
subProjects.description: Manage users and user roles etc

subProjects.title: System Adminstration
subProjects.description: Manage system settings, journal template settings, toggle system features etc

subProjects.title: Dashboards
subProjects.description: Allows system users to view activities and more detailed analysis on journals

06.title: Neon Floors
06.description:
Neon Floors is a web application, will let casinos to setup their attractive floor plan with assets and track players activity on the floor live and more.
App will also allow casino operators to send promotions, alerts and manage player glabling behaviours.

subProjects.title: Floorlens
subProjects.description: View live player activities and floor operation

06.title: Neon Analytics
06.description: <q>Neon Analytics</q> is a data visualisation platform for casinos using the IGS' Neon service. It  integrates vast amounts of transactional data from disparate casino source cubes. It helps to run casinos business intelligence by retrieving, analyzing, transforming and reporting data.

06.title: Neon Touch
06.description:
Neon Touch is browser based app runs on touch device of the slot machines. App is developed using Angular and .net Core.
App talks to service fabric microservices and web sockets.

06.title: Customer Query Builder
06.description: Searching tool for large customer base for casinos

06.title: Neon Mix
06.description:
Neon Mix is browser based app runs on slot machines in kiosk mode. App is developed using Angular and .net Core.
App talks to service fabric microservices and web sockets.

06.title: TableLite
06.description:
TableLite is a modern browser based application built using technologies like AngularJS (v1.7) and .Net Core (v2.1). Application can be hosted on any platform (WIndows/Linux/OSX). Front end communicates with server over Restful API (Web API).
The app helps the casinos to track the cash drops on a gambling table.

05.title: Intuitive Dashboards
05.description: <q>Intuitive Dashboards</q> is a data visualisation tool developed using cutting-edge technologies like JavaScript (VanillaJS, Kendo UI, BackboneJS, UnderscoreJS, RequireJS, jQuery, ReactJS), HTML5 and CSS3. Web application consumes RESTful API (WCF service) built on.Net framework on top of SQL database - which is the backbone for the whole application. Dashboard Web Client is a targeting the current Mobile users and PC users - the aim is to make one application compatible with all screen sized devices in the market without using any browser plug-ins.

05.title: Server Tools
05.description: The tool is aimed to perform cloning the dashboard database entities into XML file then migrate them to another dashboard database. This provides entity portability, in turn, helps the existing Business intelligence software users to backup/build/enhance the migrated dashboards on their system.

05.title: Security Filters and Dashboard API
05.description: Aim of the security filter is to provide overall security to the data used by existing Business Intelligence software, where URL parameters are encrypted and passed across the servers and other security features at datasets level. A Test Harness (Windows application) is developed to test these security features. Also an API is developed for other developers of the other software to consume dashboard service.

04.title: Chronos
04.description: <q>Chronos</q> is the Patient Appointment Confirmation Service for NHS - which is a unique blend of agent calls, IVR calls, SMS and emails to remind and confirm the intentions of the NHS patients to drive down Did-Not-Attend (DNAs) rate. IVR and agent calling uses Linux free switches concept on mono run-time. Clients (NHS Trusts) use Web App, Callers use Agent App to make live calls and Supervisors use Team Leader App to monitor the agents on shift.

00.title: Personal Portfolio
00.description: The site you viewing is my personal profile. It is made with reactJS

00.title: Quote Gun
00.description: Quote Gun is made with VueJS. It uses the API from favq.com to display the quote

00.title: KeyCode Vuewer
00.description: KeyCode Vuewer is made with VueJS. On keydown it displays related keycode

00.title: Multi-Runner Game
00.description: It is a virtual horse race prototype - aim is to extend this app to a full blown racing game

00.title: Clicky Bucky Game
00.description: It is a game similar to candy crush.

00.title: Image2PDF conveter
00.description: Web utility to convert selected image (jpeg/jpg) file into a PDF file
